judges: Before Bell, C. J., Musmanno, Jones, Cohen, Eagen, O’Brien and Egberts, JJ.
Mr. Justice Musmanno did not participate in the decision of this case.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Pee Curiam,
Judgment affirmed by an evenly divided Court.
Mr. Justice Musmanno did not participate in the decision of this case.
opinions.author: Pee Curiam, Judgment affirmed by an evenly divided Court.

attorneys: John G. Gent, with him Quinn, Plate, Gent, Buseck & Leemhuis, for appellant.
John W. Beatty, with him Knox, Graham, Pearson & McLaughlin, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
Skelton, Appellant, v. Thompson.
Argued October 8, 1968.
Before Bell, C. J., Musmanno, Jones, Cohen, Eagen, O’Brien and Egberts, JJ.
reargument refused December 18, 1968.
John G. Gent, with him Quinn, Plate, Gent, Buseck & Leemhuis, for appellant.
John W. Beatty, with him Knox, Graham, Pearson & McLaughlin, for appellee.
November 13, 1968:
